data.question: What is the empirical formula of MOF-177-B?
At what temperature was the TGA trace of as-synthesized MOF-177-E conducted under air flow?
data.answer: The TGA trace was conducted from room temperature up to 600°C.

What method was used to solve the structure of MOF-177-I?
data.answer: Direct methods using the SHELXTL software package
